Error.ErrorText: Observation Code must have a valid value from the list of the observation codes adopted by Riayati, refer to the MOHAP observation list (LOINC , Description, Modifier, Duration ,InvoiceNumber ,InvoiceDate ,File , UniversalNumberingSystemDental,ActivityGross ,PSDeductible ,PSCoPayment ,PSOutOfPocket ,DRGInlierPayment ,DRGOutlierPayment ,DRGTransferPayment, DRGTotalPayment, ActivityCost, ActivityPatientShare, BundleID, PackageID, ExcludeFromDRG, EncounterID, eRxReferenceNo, Refill, Prescription, OfflineAuthorization, EReference)
